entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023
